Address.value: 111 MCINNIS PARKWAY, SAN RAFAEL, California, 94903, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Founded in 1982, Autodesk is an application software company that serves industries in architecture, engineering, and construction; product design and manufacturing; and media and entertainment. Autodesk software enables design, modeling, and rendering needs of these industries. The company has over 4 million paid subscribers across 180 countries.

value.name: Steven M. Blum
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
